definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Liu2 xue2 Ji1 jin1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 国家留学基金管理委员会

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留学生持居留许可在华居住方属合法。

sentences.english: During this period, a large number of youngers participated in the movement and went abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在这期间大批青年远涉重洋，赴法留学。

sentences.english: A study plan written in Chinese.
Since its founding, has received more than 400 foreign students trained people.
sentences.chinese: 建校以来，先后接受培养了外国留学生400余人。

sentences.english: What on earth humiliates the image of "students studying abroad"?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什么损害了“留学生”的品牌形象？

sentences.english: Studying abroad provides an opportunity to broaden your experience and mind.
sentences.chinese: 出国留学是一个增加阅历和拓宽思想的良好机会。

sentences.english: Students should register in the International Student Office on time in accordance with the term schedule.
sentences.chinese: 专业生和语言生均须按规定时间到留学生办公室报到。

sentences.english: China is the country that sends the most students abroad for studies and researches.
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界上出国前留学生最多的国家。

sentences.english: I wish I could be sent abroad to study at government expense.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能被派到国外公费留学。

sentences.english: What's the advantage of studying abroad?
sentences.chinese: 出国留学的优势是什么呢？

sentences.english: They both bewailed their misfortune at being young, unmarried returned students.
sentences.chinese: 两人慨叹不幸身为青年未婚留学生的麻烦。

sentences.english: That's what an ordinary returned student can appreciate, the poetry of the ehr-mao-tzu.
sentences.chinese: 这是普通留学生所能欣赏的二毛子旧诗。

sentences.english: The University of Southern, California in Los Angeles once again had the highest number of foreign students.
sentences.chinese: 洛山矶的南加州大学再一次成为留学生最多的学校。

sentences.english: The issue revolves around the behaviour of Chinese and Japanese students.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题主要围绕着中日留学生的表现。

sentences.english: What do I need to access to Internet at Dayuncun Foreign Students Dormitory?
sentences.chinese: 大运村留学生公寓正常使用互联网的必备条件有那些？

sentences.english: The effect of overseas students on the US scientific community is crucial.
sentences.chinese: 海外留学生在美国科学界有着至关重要的作用。

definition: student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to study away from home or abroad (old)
to enter the next grade school
to accompany one's child or spouse who is studying overseas/to help a child with their study, reading or practicing together
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to send sb abroad at the government's expense
to return to one's home country
